info.title: DPDServices API
info.description:
# DPDServices The purpose of this document is to describe the functionality and utilization of Web Service interfaces for the use of DPD clients. The solution provided offers a universal (independent of the client's system) tool for transmitting information between client systems and DPD. The following Web Service methods are available: - Validation of shipment data and assignment of waybill numbers - Generation of waybill labels - Generation of receipt protocols and data notification - Courier booking - Postal code lookup - Courier availability check - Validation of return shipment data with predefined waybill numbers and notification Each Web Service method call is authorized by a login and password and marked with one of three error-handling policies: - Termination of processing upon encountering the first error - Ignoring shipments with incorrect data - Termination of processing upon encountering the first error and cancellation of processed shipments before the error occurred. (This option is available only in some Web Service methods) A client integrated with DPD Poland through this solution can be assured of the compliance of prepared shipments with the current standard, which implies an improvement in the efficiency and reliability of services offered by our courier company. ## Environments **Production environment:**
Production services are available at: https://dpdservicesdemo.dpd.com.pl

**Demo environment:**
Demo services are available at: https://dpdservicesdemo.dpd.com.pl

To access the DEMO environment, you will need the following login credentials: - **Login:** test - **Password:** thetu4Ee - **Master FID:** 1495 ## Authentication All endpoints require of **Basic Authentication** and the **x-dpd-fid: {{masterfid}}** header: ## Configuration of Login and Password The complete configuration of a user account authorized to use the web service is carried out in DPD Poland's systems after prior agreements with the client. # Available Services Within the scope of generating a waybill, it's possible to include services that modify various aspects related to parcel delivery. Depending on whether the parcel will be delivered domestically or internationally, the list of services will differ. Some services require specific conditions that must be met to be used. Validation of certain services may also exclude their simultaneous use. ### Services | Service Code | Service | Domestic / International | Notes | |-------------------------|---------------------------------------------------|--------------------------|-----------------------------------| | B2C | B2C | `domestic` | Required Attributes:
`VALUE` - e.g. '10:00-13:00' | | CARRY_IN | Carry in | `domestic` | | | COD * | Cash on delivery | `domestic`
`international` | Currencies - only PLN, EUR, RON, CZK
Required Attributes:
`AMOUNT` - e.g. '39.99'
`CURRENCY` - e.g. 'PLN' | | CUD | Return shipment | `domestic` | | | DECLARED_VALUE | Declared value | `domestic`
`international` | Shipment insurance. Currencies - only PLN, CHF, EUR, NOK, SEK, USD, GBP, HUF, CZK
Required Attributes:
`AMOUNT` - e.g. '39.99'
`CURRENCY` - e.g. 'PLN' | | DIGITAL_LABEL ** | Digital label service | `domestic` | Only for single-package shipments | | DPD_EXPRESS | Air transport | `international` | | | DPD_FOOD | Food transportation service | `domestic` | Only for specified postal codes
Required Attributes:
`LIMIT_DATE` - product's expiration date (ISO-8601 format), which must not be less than 2 business days e.g. '2039-12-31' | | DPD_LQ * | ADR transportation service | `domestic`
`international` | Dangerous shipment: ADR weight required | | DPD_NEXT_DAY | Delivery on next day | `domestic` | | | DPD_PICKUP | Parcel delivery service to the PUDO point | `domestic`
`international` | Only for specified postal codes
Required Attributes:
`PUDO` - e.g. '1111'
Domestic service only for single parcel shipments | | DPD_TODAY * | Delivery on same day | `domestic` | Only for specified postal codes | | DUTY | Duty | `international` | Required Attributes:
`AMOUNT` - e.g. '39.99'
`CURRENCY` - e.g. 'PLN' | | HAND_DELIVERY | Hand delivery | `domestic` | | | INTERNATIONAL | Guaranteed day of delivery | `international` | | | PALETTE | Transport service with the use of a pallet | `international` | For packages heavier than 31.5 kg | | PRIVATE_PERSON * | Private person | `domestic`
`international` | | | PUDO_TO_SEND ** | Pudo to send service | `domestic` | Requires providing package dimensions | | ROD | Return document | `domestic` | | | SATURDAY | Delivery on Saturday | `domestic` | | | TIME0930 | Delivery before 09:30 | `domestic` | Only for specified postal codes | | TIME1200 | Delivery before 12:00 | `domestic` | Only for specified postal codes | | TIRES | Tires transport | `domestic` | | | TIRES_EXPORT | International tires transport | `international` | | \* Note 1: Services - B2C - COD for international shipments - DPD_FOOD - DPD_LQ - DPD_TODAY - PRIVATE_PERSON are available exclusively after prior agreements between the DPD client and their account manager and must be configured in a special way for each client. ** Note 2: The 'DIGITAL_LABEL' service and the 'PUDO_TO_SEND' service should be notified simultaneously; otherwise, an error will be returned ### Mutually exclusive services ### Domestic | Service Code | Excluded with | |--------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | B2C | DPD_NEXT_DAY, DPD_TODAY, SATURDAY, DPD_FOOD, TIME1200, TIME0930, TIRES, DPD_PICKUP | | CARRY_IN | DPD_FOOD, DPD_PICKUP | | DPD_FOOD | B2C, CARRY_IN, DPD_LQ, SATURDAY, TIRES | | DPD_LQ | DPD_FOOD, PALETTE, TIRES | | DPD_NEXT_DAY | B2C, DPD_PICKUP, DPD_TODAY, SATURDAY, TIME1200, TIME0930, TIRES | | DPD_PICKUP | B2C, CARRY_IN, DPD_NEXT_DAY, HAND_DELIVERY, SATURDAY, TIME0930, TIME1200 | | DPD_TODAY | B2C, DPD_NEXT_DAY, SATURDAY, TIME0930, TIME1200, TIRES | | HAND_DELIVERY | DPD_PICKUP | | PALETTE | DPD_LQ | | SATURDAY | B2C, DPD_FOOD, DPD_NEXT_DAY, DPD_PICKUP, DPD_TODAY, TIME0930, TIME1200 | | | TIME0930 | B2C, DPD_NEXT_DAY, DPD_PICKUP, DPD_TODAY, SATURDAY, TIME1200, TIRES | | TIME1200 | B2C, DPD_NEXT_DAY, DPD_PICKUP, DPD_TODAY, SATURDAY, TIME0930, TIRES | | TIRES | B2C, DPD_FOOD, DPD_LQ, DPD_NEXT_DAY, DPD_TODAY, TIME0930, TIME1200 | ### International | Service Code | Excluded with | |----------------|-----------------------------------| | COD | INTERNATIONAL, PALETTE | | DPD_PICKUP | INTERNATIONAL, PALETTE | | INTERNATIONAL | COD, DPD_PICKUP, PALETTE, TIRES | | PALETTE | COD, DPD_PICKUP, INTERNATIONAL, TIRES | | TIRES | INTERNATIONAL, PALETTE | # Sample Requests ## Generate multiple packages/parcels To create multiple packages for different recipients, replicate the packages section. Each package object represents a distinct shipment containing recipient, sender, and package details. However, if you intend to send multiple parcels to a single recipient, duplicate the parcels section within the same package. For instance: ```json { "generationPolicy": "STOP_ON_FIRST_ERROR", "packages": [ { "reference": "reference_package_1", "receiver": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "sender": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "payerFID": 9999, "services": [], "parcels": [ { "reference": "reference_parcel_1", "weight": 10, "weightAdr": 0, "sizeX": 11, "sizeY": 12, "sizeZ": 13 } ] }, { "reference": "reference_package_2", "receiver": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "sender": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "payerFID": 9999, "services": [], "parcels": [ { "reference": "reference_parcel_1", "weight": 10, "weightAdr": 0, "sizeX": 11, "sizeY": 12, "sizeZ": 13 }, { "reference": "reference_parcel_2", "weight": 20, "weightAdr": 0, "sizeX": 21, "sizeY": 22, "sizeZ": 23 } ] } ] } ``` This structure allows for the creation of multiple shipments for different recipients or send multiple parcels within same shipment. By duplicating the packages section and customizing each package, additional shipments can be added for either the same or different recipients. ## Generate multiple labels It is possible to generate multiple labels based on specific parameters within a single request. Labels can be generated using the following parameters: - sessionID: All shipments created within a specific session. - package reference: All parcels within a single package. - parcel reference and parcel waybill: Parcels identified by specific references or waybills. ### Example 1: Generating labels for parcels with specified parcel waybills ```json { "labelSearchParams": { "policy": "STOP_ON_FIRST_ERROR", "session": { "packages": [ { "parcels": [ { "waybill": "1111111111111S" } ] }, { "parcels": [ { "waybill": "2222222222222S" } ] } ], "type": "DOMESTIC" }, "outputDocFormat": "PDF", "format": "A4", "outputType": "BIC3", "variant": "STANDARD" } } ``` ### Example 2: Generating labels for all parcels within different package references ```json { "labelSearchParams": { "policy": "STOP_ON_FIRST_ERROR", "session": { "packages": [ { "reference": "packagereference1" }, { "reference": "packagereference2" }, ], "type": "DOMESTIC" }, "outputDocFormat": "PDF", "format": "A4", "outputType": "BIC3", "variant": "STANDARD" } } ``` ## Generate packages with services
B2C ```json { "generationPolicy": "STOP_ON_FIRST_ERROR", "packages": [ { "reference": "", "receiver": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "sender": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "payerFID": 9999, "ref1": "", "ref2": "", "ref3": "", "services": [ { "code": "B2C", "attributes": [ { "code": "VALUE", "value": "10:00-13:00" } ] } ], "parcels": [ { "reference": "", "weight": 10, "weightAdr": 0, "sizeX": 11, "sizeY": 12, "sizeZ": 13 } ] } ] } ```
CARRY_IN ```json { "generationPolicy": "STOP_ON_FIRST_ERROR", "packages": [ { "reference": "", "receiver": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "sender": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "payerFID": 9999, "ref1": "", "ref2": "", "ref3": "", "services": [ { "code": "CARRY_IN" } ], "parcels": [ { "reference": "", "weight": 32, "weightAdr": 0, "sizeX": 11, "sizeY": 12, "sizeZ": 13 } ] } ] } ```
COD ```json { "generationPolicy": "STOP_ON_FIRST_ERROR", "packages": [ { "reference": "", "receiver": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "sender": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "payerFID": 9999, "ref1": "", "ref2": "", "ref3": "", "services": [ { "code": "COD", "attributes": [ { "code": "AMOUNT", "value": "100" }, { "code": "CURRENCY", "value": "PLN" } ] } ], "parcels": [ { "reference": "", "weight": 10, "weightAdr": 0, "sizeX": 11, "sizeY": 12, "sizeZ": 13 } ] } ] } ```
CUD ```json { "generationPolicy": "STOP_ON_FIRST_ERROR", "packages": [ { "reference": "", "receiver": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "sender": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "payerFID": 9999, "ref1": "", "ref2": "", "ref3": "", "services": [ { "code": "CUD" } ], "parcels": [ { "reference": "", "weight": 10, "weightAdr": 0, "sizeX": 11, "sizeY": 12, "sizeZ": 13 } ] } ] } ```
DECLARED_VALUE ```json { "generationPolicy": "STOP_ON_FIRST_ERROR", "packages": [ { "reference": "", "receiver": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "sender": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "payerFID": 9999, "ref1": "", "ref2": "", "ref3": "", "services": [ { "code": "DECLARED_VALUE", "attributes": [ { "code": "AMOUNT", "value": "100" }, { "code": "CURRENCY", "value": "PLN" } ] } ], "parcels": [ { "reference": "", "weight": 10, "weightAdr": 0, "sizeX": 11, "sizeY": 12, "sizeZ": 13 } ] } ] } ```
DIGITAL_LABEL ```json { "generationPolicy": "STOP_ON_FIRST_ERROR", "packages": [ { "reference": "", "receiver": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "sender": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "payerFID": 9999, "ref1": "", "ref2": "", "ref3": "", "services": [ { "code": "DIGITAL_LABEL" }, { "code": "PUDO_TO_SEND" } ], "parcels": [ { "reference": "", "weight": 10, "weightAdr": 0, "sizeX": 11, "sizeY": 12, "sizeZ": 13 } ] } ] } ```
DPD_EXPRESS ```json { "generationPolicy": "STOP_ON_FIRST_ERROR", "packages": [ { "reference": "", "receiver": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Praga", "countryCode": "CZ", "postalCode": "36238", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "sender": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "payerFID": 9999, "ref1": "", "ref2": "", "ref3": "", "services": [ { "code": "DPD_EXPRESS" } ], "parcels": [ { "reference": "", "weight": 2, "weightAdr": 0, "sizeX": 11, "sizeY": 12, "sizeZ": 13, "content": "test" } ] } ] } ```
DPD_FOOD ```json { "generationPolicy": "STOP_ON_FIRST_ERROR", "packages": [ { "reference": "", "receiver": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "sender": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "payerFID": 9999, "ref1": "", "ref2": "", "ref3": "", "services": [ { "code": "DPD_FOOD", "attributes": [ { "code": "LIMIT_DATE", "value": "2099-12-15" } ] } ], "parcels": [ { "reference": "", "weight": 2, "weightAdr": 0, "sizeX": 11, "sizeY": 12, "sizeZ": 13 } ] } ] } ```
DPD_LQ ```json { "generationPolicy": "STOP_ON_FIRST_ERROR", "packages": [ { "reference": "", "receiver": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "sender": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "payerFID": 9999, "ref1": "", "ref2": "", "ref3": "", "services": [ { "code": "DPD_LQ" } ], "parcels": [ { "reference": "", "weight": 2, "weightAdr": 2, "sizeX": 11, "sizeY": 12, "sizeZ": 13 } ] } ] } ```
DPD_NEXT_DAY ```json { "generationPolicy": "STOP_ON_FIRST_ERROR", "packages": [ { "reference": "", "receiver": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "sender": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "payerFID": 9999, "ref1": "", "ref2": "", "ref3": "", "services": [ { "code": "DPD_NEXT_DAY" } ], "parcels": [ { "reference": "", "weight": 2, "weightAdr": 0, "sizeX": 11, "sizeY": 12, "sizeZ": 13 } ] } ] } ```
DPD_PICKUP ```json { "generationPolicy": "STOP_ON_FIRST_ERROR", "packages": [ { "reference": "", "pudoReceiver": { "company": "firma nadawcy", "name": "nazwa nadawcy", "countryCode": "PL", "phone": "123123123", "email": "email@dpd.pl" }, "sender": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "payerFID": 9999, "ref1": "", "ref2": "", "ref3": "", "services": [ { "code": "DPD_PICKUP", "attributes": [ { "code": "PUDO", "value": "PL14509" } ] } ], "parcels": [ { "reference": "", "weight": 2, "weightAdr": 0, "sizeX": 11, "sizeY": 12, "sizeZ": 13 } ] } ] } ```
DPD_TODAY ```json { "generationPolicy": "STOP_ON_FIRST_ERROR", "packages": [ { "reference": "", "receiver": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "sender": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "payerFID": 9999, "ref1": "", "ref2": "", "ref3": "", "services": [ { "code": "DPD_TODAY" } ], "parcels": [ { "reference": "", "weight": 2, "weightAdr": 0, "sizeX": 11, "sizeY": 12, "sizeZ": 13 } ] } ] } ```
DUTY ```json { "generationPolicy": "STOP_ON_FIRST_ERROR", "packages": [ { "reference": "", "receiver": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Londyn", "countryCode": "GB", "postalCode": "N225AA", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "sender": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "payerFID": 9999, "ref1": "", "ref2": "", "ref3": "", "services": [ { "code": "DUTY", "attributes": [ { "code": "AMOUNT", "value": "100" },{ "code": "CURRENCY", "value": "PLN" } ] } ], "parcels": [ { "reference": "", "weight": 2, "weightAdr": 0, "sizeX": 11, "sizeY": 12, "sizeZ": 13, "content": "test" } ] } ] } ```
HAND_DELIVERY ```json { "generationPolicy": "STOP_ON_FIRST_ERROR", "packages": [ { "reference": "", "receiver": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "sender": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "payerFID": 9999, "ref1": "", "ref2": "", "ref3": "", "services": [ { "code": "HAND_DELIVERY" } ], "parcels": [ { "reference": "", "weight": 2, "weightAdr": 0, "sizeX": 11, "sizeY": 12, "sizeZ": 13 } ] } ] } ```
INTERNATIONAL ```json { "generationPolicy": "STOP_ON_FIRST_ERROR", "packages": [ { "reference": "", "receiver": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Berlin", "countryCode": "DE", "postalCode": "12251", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "sender": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "payerFID": 9999, "ref1": "", "ref2": "", "ref3": "", "services": [ { "code": "INTERNATIONAL" } ], "parcels": [ { "reference": "", "weight": 2, "weightAdr": 0, "sizeX": 11, "sizeY": 12, "sizeZ": 13, "content": "test" } ] } ] } ```
PALETTE ```json { "generationPolicy": "STOP_ON_FIRST_ERROR", "packages": [ { "reference": "", "receiver": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Berlin", "countryCode": "DE", "postalCode": "12251", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "sender": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "payerFID": 9999, "ref1": "", "ref2": "", "ref3": "", "services": [ { "code": "PALETTE" } ], "parcels": [ { "reference": "", "weight": 32, "weightAdr": 0, "sizeX": 11, "sizeY": 12, "sizeZ": 13, "content": "test" } ] } ] } ```
PRIVATE_PERSON ```json { "generationPolicy": "STOP_ON_FIRST_ERROR", "packages": [ { "reference": "", "receiver": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "sender": { "company": "DPD Polska Sp. z o.o.", "name": "Jan Kowalski", "address": "string", "city": "Warszawa", "countryCode": "PL", "postalCode": "01354", "phone": "48732121245", "email": "dpd@dpd.com.pl" }, "payerFID": 9999, "ref1": "", "ref2": "", "ref3": "", "services": [ { "code": "PRIVATE_PERSON" } ], "parcels": [ { "reference": "", "weight": 2, "weightAdr": 0, "sizeX": 11, "sizeY": 12, "sizeZ": 13 } ] } ] } ```

get.description:
Searches postal code. The API allows you to check whether a package can be sent to a given address.
It's a good idea to check the zip code before trying to create a package.


This method accepts the following input parameters:

- Postal code and country code

On the DPD system side, the following operation is performed:

- Check the correctness and existence of the postal code in the specified country.

The method returns:

- Information about the validity of the provided postal code or an explanation of why the given postal code is not valid.

post.description:
Creates packages and parcels. Generates waybill numbers to identify packages and parcels.
Defines the sender and recipient for package. Provides additional services to created packages and parcels.


The method accepts the following input parameters:
- Shipment and parcel list data (optionally with reference numbers client) that are subject to validation. Dimensions are given in centimeters, a weight in kilograms.
- Generation policy (error handling)


The following operations are performed on the DPD system side:
- Validation of submitted data
- Validation of package dimensions
- Generating waybill numbers for parcels


The method returns:
- A session with a list of shipments and parcels with assigned shipping numbers, customer reference numbers and validation statuses
- Unique identifier of the DPD system

post.summary: Create international return packages and parcels to PL (sent at PickUp point)
post.description:
Creates international return packages and parcels to PL, that will be sent from the PickUp point.
Generates waybill numbers to identify packages and parcels. Provides additional service - PUDO_RETURN.


This method accepts the following input parameters:

- Data of a list of shipments and parcels (optionally with customer reference numbers) subject to validation. Dimensions are provided in centimeters, and weight in kilograms.
- Sender and recipient data for the shipment

On the DPD system side, the following operations are performed:

- Validation of the submitted data
- Generation of waybill numbers for parcels

The method returns:

- A session with a list of shipments and parcels with assigned waybill numbers, customer reference numbers, and validation statuses
- A unique identifier from the DPD system

post.summary: Create packages and parcels (predefined waybill numbers)
post.description:
Creates packages and parcels for predefined waybill numbers to identify packages and parcels.
Defines the sender and recipient for package. Provides additional services to created packages and parcels.
Generates label. Advises parcels.

Adds parcel to existing package. Generates waybill for added parcel.


This method accepts the following input parameters:

- Parcel data to be added to a shipment, including:
  - Data for locating the shipment
  - Data about the new parcel

On the DPD system side, the following operations are performed:

- Check the client's authorization to add a specific type of event
- Add a parcel to an existing shipment

The method returns:

- Status of the executed operation
- Waybill of the newly added parcel
- Exception for incorrect input data
- Exception if the client lacks authorization to use the service
- Exception if the client has provided return shipment data (adding parcels to return shipments is restricted)

Generates label. Advises parcels.


The method accepts the following input parameters:
- A list of shipments to be processed
- Generation policy (error handling)
- The format in which the labels are to be generated
- The page format in which the labels are to be generated
- Label type: regular or extended

The following operations are performed on the DPD system side:
- Generate labels in the desired format using sessionId, waybill or reference provided

Labels can be generated based on one of the following criteria:
- Session ID: Identifies parcels within a session
- Package reference: Customer reference number associated with package
- Parcel waybill: Unique identifier for individual parcel
- Parcel reference: Customer reference number associated with parcel

The method returns:
- A session with a list of shipments and parcels with assigned shipping numbers, customer reference numbers and validation statuses
- Generated labels in the desired format

Generates protocol


The method accepts the following input parameters:
- A list of shipments and packages to be processed. Shipment group with packets can be specified in four ways: Session ID, Package Reference, Parcel Reference, Parcel Waybill
- Generation policy (error handling)
- The format in which the protocol is to be generated

The following operations are performed on the DPD system side:
- Generate protocol in the desired format


The method returns:
- A session with a list of shipments and parcels with assigned shipping numbers, customer reference numbers and validation statuses
- Generated protocol in the desired format

Generates international return label (available only after coordination with the account manager).


This method is used to create international return shipments and accepts the following input parameters:

- Parcel data for return to an international shipment, including:
  - Waybills to locate the parcel being returned
  - Recipient data for the return shipment
  - Printing parameters

On the DPD system side, the following operations are performed:

- Check the client's authorization to add a specific type of event
- Add a parcel to an existing shipment

The method returns:

- Status of the executed operation
- Generated labels in the requested format
- Waybill of the generated return parcel
- Exception for incorrect input data
- Exception if the client lacks authorization to use the service

This method is not available by default and requires special configuration on the DPD system side to allow clients who can use it.

Generates return label.


This method is used to create domestic return shipments and accepts the following input parameters:

- Parcel data for return to a domestic shipment, including:
  - Waybills to locate the parcel being returned
  - Recipient data for the return shipment
  - Printing parameters

On the DPD system side, the following operations are performed:

- Verification of whether the payer has activated the Consumer Returns service in the Customer Management application
- Check the client's authorization to add a specific type of event
- Add a parcel to an existing shipment

The method returns:

- Status of the executed operation
- Generated labels in the requested format
- Waybills of the generated return parcels
- Exception for incorrect input data
- Exception if the client lacks authorization to use the service
- Exception if the payer does not have an active Consumer Returns service

This method is not available by default and requires special configuration on the DPD system side to allow clients who can use it.

Generates Pins. Advises parcels.

The method accepts the following input parameters:

A list of shipments to be processed
Generation policy (error handling)
The following operations are performed on the DPD system side:

Generate Pin using sessionId, waybill or reference provided
Pin can be generated based on one of the following criteria:

Session ID: Identifies parcels within a session
Package reference: Customer reference number associated with package
Parcel waybill: Unique identifier for individual parcel
Parcel reference: Customer reference number associated with parcel
The method returns:

A session with a list of shipments and parcels with assigned shipping numbers, customer reference numbers and validation statuses
Generated Pins

get.description:
Checks courier availability. The API allows you to check whether a courier can be ordered to a given address.


This method accepts the following input parameters:

- Country code in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format
- Postal code

On the DPD system side, the following operation is performed:

- Check the availability of a courier in a given location.

The method returns:

- Information about courier availability or error messages related to the parameters.

post.description:
Creates courier order. Generates pickup call id.


This method performs one of three operations selected by the user:

- **INSERT Operation**: Add a new courier order.
- **UPDATE Operation**: Modify an existing order.
- **CANCEL Operation**: Delete an existing order.

The method takes the following input parameters:

**INSERT Operation**:

- Simplified data about parcels and shipments, including:
  - Payer's information (payer number, cost center, name)
  - Shipper's information (name, first name, phone)
  - Sender's information (name, first name, address, city, postal code, phone)
  - Details about parcel/shipment parameters (details in the web service interface description for ordering a courier)
- Preferred pickup date and time

**UPDATE Operation**:

- Order number, checksum, and strategy for handling a closed order
- Simplified data about parcels and shipments, including:
  - Payer's information (payer number, cost center, name)
  - Shipper's information (name, first name, phone)
  - Sender's information (name, first name, address, city, postal code, phone)
  - Details about parcel/shipment parameters (details in the web service interface description for ordering a courier)
- Preferred pickup date and time

**CANCEL Operation**:

- Data related to the CANCEL operation: order number and checksum

On the DPD system side, the following operations are performed:

- Validation of the correctness of the transmitted data
- Receipt of information about the receipt/modification/deletion of an order in the DPD systems

The method returns:

- System confirmation of the successful/failed acceptance/modification/deletion of the order
- Order number for INSERT/UPDATE operations
- Checksum for INSERT/UPDATE operations

parameters.name: checkSum
parameters.description: Order checksum returned during order creation. In future it can be more unique value like UUID

LabelFormat.description:
Allowed values:
- A4 - A4
- LBL_PRINTER - lbl printer

LabelGenerationPolicy.description:
Allowed values:
- STOP_ON_FIRST_ERROR - generating of labels is interrupted in the case of the first encountered error. Advised packages up to the first error will be returned.
- IGNORE_ERRORS - no label generation interruption in case of validation error

LabelVariant.description:
Label variant. Allowed values:
- STANDARD - standard
- APOLLO - apollo
- RUCH - ruch

OutputDocFormat.description:
Allowed values:
- PDF - pdf
- EPL - epl
- ZPL - zpl
- XML - xml

OutputLabelType.description:
Allowed values:
- BIC3 - BIC3
- EXTENDED - Extended
- RETURN - Return*


*Available only for international returns

SessionType.description:
Allowed values:
- DOMESTIC - Session for domestic packages
- INTERNATIONAL - Session for international packages

field.description: Full path of the field that contains the error

traceId.description: Request tracking ID. By providing it, you improve the analysis of problems related to the request.

documentData.description: Base64 encoded byte array with label content

traceId.description: Request tracking ID. By providing it, you improve the analysis of problems related to the request.

GenerateSpedLabelsStatus.description:
Allowed values:
- OK - label successfully printed
- NOT_FOUND - not found
- NOT_PROCESSED - not processed
- UNKNOWN_ERROR - unknown error
- DISABLED_API - API is disabled

SecurityErrorEnum.description:
Allowed values:
- MISSING_PERMISSION - The user does not have sufficient permissions

countryCode.description: Two character country code in ISO ALPHA-2 format
Two character country code in ISO ALPHA-2 format

ServiceCode.description: List of available services can be found in the section Available Services

ShipmentGenerationPolicy.description:
Method of generating packages and parcels. Possible values:
- STOP_ON_FIRST_ERROR - generating of parcels is interrupted in the case of the first encountered error. Packages and shipments created up to the first error will be returned.
- IGNORE_ERRORS - no parcel generation interruption in case of validation error
- ALL_OR_NOTHING - all packages will be returned or none if there is an error.

reference.description: A technical unique parcel reference (e.g. a database guid)

weight.description: In Poland, the maximum weight is 700.00 kg, the minimum is 0.01 kg. Abroad, the maximum weight is 315.00 kg, the minimum is 0.01 kg. For shipments with a pallet service, the minimum weight is 315 kg. Accuracy to two decimal places is accepted.

weightAdr.description: The maximum weight ADR is parcel weight, the minimum is 0.00 kg.

sizeX.description: Dimension X of the package expressed in centimeters

sizeY.description: Dimension Y of the package expressed in centimeters

sizeZ.description: Dimension Z of the package expressed in centimeters

content.description: Parcel content. The content field is required for international shipments. For domestic shipments it is optional.

reference.description: A technical unique package reference (e.g. a database guid)

documentData.description: Base64 encoded byte array with label content

traceId.description: Request tracking ID. By providing it, you improve the analysis of problems related to the request.

GenerateShipmentStatus.description:
Allowed values:
- OK - label successfully printed.
- NOT_FOUND - not found.
- UNKNOWN_ERROR - unknown error.
- DISABLED_API - API is disabled.
- ERROR_NO_FID_PERMISSION - missing permissions for FID.
- PARCEL_LIMIT_EXCEEDED - parcel limit is exceeded.
- WAYBILL_NUMBER_OUTSIDE_THE_ALLOWED_RANGE - waybill number outside range fo FID. Use allowed number.
- DUPLICATE_WAYBILL_NUMBER - duplicated waybill number.
- DUPLICATED_PACKAGE_SEARCH_KEY - duplicated package reference. Use unique package reference value.
- DUPLICATED_PARCEL_SEARCH_KEY - duplicated parcel reference. Use unique parcel reference value.
- NOT_PROCESSED - not processed.
- INCORRECT_DATA - incorrect data.
- DISALLOWED_FID - fid is disallowed.

ReturnGenerationPolicy.description:
Method of generating packages and parcels. Possible values:
- STOP_ON_FIRST_ERROR - generating of parcels is interrupted in the case of the first encountered error. Packages and shipments created up to the first error will be returned.
- IGNORE_ERRORS - no parcel generation interruption in case of validation error
- ALL_OR_NOTHING - all packages will be returned or none if there is an error.

countryCode.description: Two character country code in ISO ALPHA-2 format
Two character country code in ISO ALPHA-2 format

weight.description: In Poland, the maximum weight is 700.00 kg, the minimum is 0.01 kg. Abroad, the maximum weight is 315.00 kg, the minimum is 0.01 kg. For shipments with a pallet service, the minimum weight is 315 kg. Accuracy to two decimal places is accepted.

sizeX.description: Dimension X of the package expressed in centimeters

sizeY.description: Dimension Y of the package expressed in centimeters

sizeZ.description: Dimension Z of the package expressed in centimeters

content.description: Parcel content. The content field is required for international shipments. For domestic shipments it is optional.

beginTime.description: Session start in ISO-8601 format in UTC zone.

endTime.description: Session end in ISO-8601 format in UTC zone.

traceId.description: Request tracking ID. By providing it, you improve the analysis of problems related to the request.

GenerateReturnPackagesStatus.description:
Allowed values:
- OK - successful package creation
- UNKNOWN_ERROR - unknown error
- INCORRECT_DATA - incorrect data
- DISABLED_API - disabled API
- DUPLICATED_PARCEL_WAYBILL - duplicated parcel waybilll
- DISALLOWED_FID - fid is disallowed
- ERROR_NO_FID_PERMISSION - missing permissions for FID
- DUPLICATED_PACKAGE_REFERENCE - duplicated package reference. Use unique package reference value.
- DUPLICATED_PARCEL_REFERENCE - duplicated parcel reference. Use unique parcel reference value.

ReturnPackageGenerationStatus.description:
Allowed values:
- OK - package created successfully
- INCORRECT_DATA - incorrect data
- NOT_PROCESSED - not processed
- DUPLICATED_PARCEL_WAYBILL - duplicated waybill

ReturnPackageValidationErrorCode.description:
Allowed values:
- RECEIVER_COUNTRY_CODE_NOT_FOUND - Receiver country code not found
- SENDER_COUNTRY_CODE_NOT_FOUND - Sender country code not found
- INCORRECT_SENDER_POSTAL_CODE - Incorrect sender postal code
- INCORRECT_RECEIVER_POSTAL_CODE - Incorrect receiver postal code
- INCORRECT_RECEIVER_ADDRESS - Incorrect receiver address
- INCORRECT_RECEIVER_CITY - Incorrect receiver city
- TIME0930_IS_UNAVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - TIME 09:30 is unavailable for postal code
- TIME1200_IS_UNAVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - TIME 12:00 is unavailable for postal code
- NEXT_DAY_IS_UNAVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - DPD_NEXT_DAY service is unavailable for postal code
- SATURDAY_IS_UNAVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - SATURDAY service is unavailable for postal code
- INTERNATIONAL_IS_UNAVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - INTERNATIONAL service is unavailable for postal code
- TIME_FIXED_IS_UNAVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - TIME_FIXED service is unavailable for postal code
- TIME_FIXED_IS_OUT_OF_RANGE - TIME_FIXED service is out of range
- DPD_TODAY_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - DPD_TODAY service is not available for postal code
- PALETTE_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - PALETTE service is not available for postal code
- PALETTE_EXCEEDED_DIMENSION_80X120X170 - Parcel exceeded dimension 80x120x170 with PALETTE service
- PALETTE_EXCEEDED_DIMENSION_80X120X220 - Parcel exceeded dimension 80x120x220 with PALETTE service
- B2C_INCORRECT_VALUE_RANGE - B2C incorrect value range
- CLASSIC_SERVICE_IS_UNAVAILABLE - CLASSIC service is unavailable
- SELF_COLLECTION_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE_FOR_INTERNATIONAL_SHIPMENT - SELF_COLLECTION service is not available for international shipment
- DEDICATED_DELIVERY_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE_FOR_INTERNATIONAL_SHIPMENT - DEDICATED_DELIVERY service is not available for international shipment
- DUTY_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE_FOR_RECIPIENT_COUNTRY_CODE - DUTY service is not available for recipient country code
- SERVICE_IS_UNAVAILABLE - Service is unavailable
- VALUE_INCORRECT - Value is incorrect
- INCORRECT_PUDO - incorrect pudo
- DPD_FOOD_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - DPD_FOOD service is not available for postal code
- DPD_FOOD_AND_0930_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - DPD_FOOD service and TIME0930 is not available for postal code
- DPD_FOOD_AND_1200_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - DPD_FOOD service and TIME1200 is not available for postal code
- DPD_FOOD_AND_DPD_PICKUP_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - DPD_FOOD service and DPD_PICKUP is not available for postal code
- DPD_FOOD_AND_DPD_TODAY_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - DPD_FOOD service and DPD_TODAY is not available for postal code
- ERROR_SERVICES_AVAILABILITY_COD - COD service is unavailable for select postal code
- ERROR_SERVICES_AVAILABILITY_EXPRESS_COD - COD service is unavailable for select service
- DIGITAL_LABEL_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE_FOR_FID - DIGITAL_LABEL service is not available for given customer
- DPD_PICKUP_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE_FOR_PUDO - DPD_PICKUP service is not available for PUDO
- INACTIVE_PUDO - Selected PUDO is inactive
- COD_AMOUNT_CURRENCY_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE - COD service amount currency is no available

ReturnParcelGenerationStatus.description:
Allowed values:
- OK - parcel created successfully
- INCORRECT_DATA - incorrect data
- NOT_PROCESSED - not processed

ReturnParcelValidationErrorCode.description:
Allowed values:
- INCORRECT_WEIGHT - incorrect weight,
- PALETTE_EXCEEDED_DIMENSION_80X120X170 - Parcel exceeded dimension 80x120x170 with PALETTE service
- PALETTE_EXCEEDED_DIMENSION_80X120X180 - Parcel exceeded dimension 80x120x180 with PALETTE service
- PALETTE_EXCEEDED_DIMENSION_80X120X220 - Parcel exceeded dimension 80x120x220 with PALETTE service
- SIZE_X_OUT_OF_RANGE - size X is out of range
- SIZE_Y_OUT_OF_RANGE - size Y is out of range
- SIZE_Z_OUT_OF_RANGE - size Z is out of range
- SIZE_SUM_OUT_OF_RANGE - sum of sizes is out of range
- PARCEL_EXCEEDED_DIMENSION_38X41X64 - Parcel exceeded dimension 38x41x64

countryCode.description: Two character country code in ISO ALPHA-2 format

documentData.description: Base64 encoded byte array with return label content

Allowed value:
- OK - OK. Return label was created
- UNKNOWN_ERROR - unknown error
- INCORRECT_DATA - incorrect data
- NOT_FOUND - not found

- DISABLED_API - API is disabled

ProtocolGenerationPolicy.description:
Method of protocol generation. Possible values:
- STOP_ON_FIRST_ERROR - generating of protocols is interrupted in the case of the first encountered error. Protocols created up to the first error will be returned.
- IGNORE_ERRORS - no protocol generation interruption in case of validation error

ProtocolLabelSearchParams.description: Parameters for searching packages, parcels, print sessions

ProtocolOutputDocFormat.description:
Allowed values:
- PDF - pdf
- EPL - el
- ZPL - zpl
- XML - XML with data on protocol

countryCode.description: Two character country code in ISO ALPHA-2 format

ProtocolSessionType.description:
Allowed values:
- DOMESTIC - Session for domestic packages
- INTERNATIONAL - Session for international packages
- INTERNATIONAL_RETURN_PUDO - Session for international returns
- DOMESTIC_RETURN_PUDO - Session for domestic returns

documentData.description: Base64 encoded byte array with protocol content

traceId.description: Request tracking ID. By providing it, you improve the analysis of problems related to the request.

GenerateProtocolStatus.description:
Allowed value:
- OK - Correct protocol generation
- INCORRECT_DATA - incorrect data
- UNKNOWN_ERROR - unknown error
- DISABLED_API - Disabled API

ProtocolPrintStatus.description:
Protocol generation status. Allowed values:
- OK - Correct protocol generation
- INCORRECT_PICKUP_ADDRESS_FID - Incorrect pickup address FID
- INCORRECT_PICKUP_ADDRESS_COMPANY - Incorrect pickup address company
- INCORRECT_SESSION_TYPE - Incorrect session type
- NOT_FOUND - Not found
- NOT_PROCESSED - Not processed
- ACCESS_DENIED_FOR_FID - Access denied for FID
- UNKNOWN_ERROR - Unknown error
- PARCEL_LIMIT_EXCEEDED - exceeded parcel limit

GenerationPolicy.description:
Method of generating packages and parcels. Possible values:
- STOP_ON_FIRST_ERROR - generating of parcels is interrupted in the case of the first encountered error. Packages and shipments created up to the first error will be returned.
- IGNORE_ERRORS - no parcel generation interruption in case of validation error
- ALL_OR_NOTHING - all packages will be returned or none if there is an error.

reference.description: A technical unique parcel reference (e.g. a database guid)

weight.description: In Poland, the maximum weight is 700.00 kg, the minimum is 0.01 kg. Abroad, the maximum weight is 315.00 kg, the minimum is 0.01 kg. For shipments with a pallet service, the minimum weight is 315 kg. Accuracy to two decimal places is accepted.

weightAdr.description: The maximum weight ADR is parcel weight, the minimum is 0.00 kg.

sizeX.description: Dimension X of the package expressed in centimeters

sizeY.description: Dimension Y of the package expressed in centimeters

sizeZ.description: Dimension Z of the package expressed in centimeters

content.description: Parcel content. The content field is required for international shipments. For domestic shipments it is optional.

reference.description: A technical unique package reference (e.g. a database guid)

beginTime.description: Session start in ISO-8601 format in UTC zone.

endTime.description: Session end in ISO-8601 format in UTC zone.

traceId.description: Request tracking ID. By providing it, you improve the analysis of problems related to the request.

MultiPackageGenerationStatus.description:
Allowed values:
- OK - successful package creation
- UNKNOWN_ERROR - unknown error
- INCORRECT_DATA - incorrect data
- DISABLED_API - disabled API
- ERROR_NO_FID_PERMISSION - missing permissions for FID
- DUPLICATED_PACKAGE_REFERENCE - duplicated package reference. Use unique package reference value.
- DUPLICATED_PARCEL_REFERENCE - duplicated parcel reference. Use unique parcel reference value.
- NOT_PROCESSED - not processed
- DISALLOWED_FID - fid is disallowed
- DUPLICATED_ALTERNATIVE_PARCEL_NUMBER - duplicated alternative parcel number. Use unique value.

PackageGenerationStatusGPN.description:
Allowed values:
- OK - package created successfully
- INCORRECT_DATA - incorrect data
- NOT_PROCESSED - not processed
- DUPLICATED_ALTERNATIVE_PARCEL_NUMBER - duplicated alternative parcel number

PackageValidationErrorCodeGPN.description:
Allowed values:
    RECEIVER_COUNTRY_CODE_NOT_FOUND - Receiver country code not found
    SENDER_COUNTRY_CODE_NOT_FOUND - Sender country code not found
    INCORRECT_SENDER_POSTAL_CODE - Incorrect sender postal code
    INCORRECT_RECEIVER_POSTAL_CODE - Incorrect receiver postal code
    INCORRECT_RECEIVER_ADDRESS - Incorrect receiver address
    INCORRECT_RECEIVER_CITY - Incorrect receiver city
    TIME0930_IS_UNAVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - TIME 09:30 is unavailable for postal code
    TIME1200_IS_UNAVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - TIME 12:00 is unavailable for postal code
    NEXT_DAY_IS_UNAVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - DPD_NEXT_DAY service is unavailable for postal code
    SATURDAY_IS_UNAVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - SATURDAY service is unavailable for postal code
    INTERNATIONAL_IS_UNAVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - INTERNATIONAL service is unavailable for postal code
    TIME_FIXED_IS_UNAVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - TIME_FIXED service is unavailable for postal code
    TIME_FIXED_IS_OUT_OF_RANGE - TIME_FIXED service is out of range
    DPD_TODAY_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - DPD_TODAY service is not available for postal code
    PALETTE_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - PALETTE service is not available for postal code
    PALETTE_EXCEEDED_DIMENSION_80X120X170 - Parcel exceeded dimension 80x120x170 with PALETTE service
    PALETTE_EXCEEDED_DIMENSION_80X120X220 - Parcel exceeded dimension 80x120x220 with PALETTE service
    B2C_INCORRECT_VALUE_RANGE - B2C incorrect value range
    CLASSIC_SERVICE_IS_UNAVAILABLE - CLASSIC service is unavailable
    SELF_COLLECTION_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE_FOR_INTERNATIONAL_SHIPMENT - SELF_COLLECTION service is not available for international shipment
    DEDICATED_DELIVERY_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE_FOR_INTERNATIONAL_SHIPMENT - DEDICATED_DELIVERY service is not available for international shipment
    DUTY_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE_FOR_RECIPIENT_COUNTRY_CODE - DUTY service is not available for recipient country code
    SERVICE_IS_UNAVAILABLE - Service is unavailable
    VALUE_INCORRECT - Value is incorrect
    INCORRECT_PUDO - incorrect pudo
    DPD_FOOD_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - DPD_FOOD service is not available for postal code
    DPD_FOOD_AND_0930_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - DPD_FOOD service and TIME0930 is not available for postal code
    DPD_FOOD_AND_1200_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - DPD_FOOD service and TIME1200 is not available for postal code
    DPD_FOOD_AND_DPD_PICKUP_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - DPD_FOOD service and DPD_PICKUP is not available for postal code
    DPD_FOOD_AND_DPD_TODAY_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - DPD_FOOD service and DPD_TODAY is not available for postal code
    DIGITAL_LABEL_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE_FOR_FID - DIGITAL_LABEL service is not available for given customer
    DPD_PICKUP_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE_FOR_PUDO - DPD_PICKUP service is not available for PUDO
    COD_DEDICATED_ACCOUNT_UNAVAILABLE_FOR_INTERNATIONAL_SHIPMENT - COD dedicated account service is not available for international shipment
    DPD_FOOD_IS_NOT_SUPPORTED_BY_PUDO - DPD_FOOD service is not supported by PUDO
    DPD_FOOD_SERVICE_HAS_INCORRECT_LIMIT_DATE - DPD_FOOD service has incorrect limit date
    INACTIVE_PUDO - Selected PUDO is inactive
    COD_CURRENCY_ONLY_EUR_AVAILABLE_FOR_COUNTRY - COD service currency is only EUR available for selected country
    COD_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE_FOR_POSTAL_CODE - COD service is unavailable for select postal code
    COD_SERVICE_INTERNATIONAL_AVAILABLE_FOR_SINGLE_PARCEL_SHIPMENT - International COD service is available only for single parcel shipment
    INCORRECT_DATE_FORMAT - incorrect date format
    SERVICES_NOT_SUPPORTED_BY_PUDO - some of the selected services are not supported by PUDO
    INCORRECT_COUNTRY_FOR_SERVICE - Incorrect country code for the service
    INCORRECT_COUNTRY - Incorrect sender or receiver country code
    ALLEGRO_DELIVERY_SERVICE_HAS_INCORRECT_ALLEGRO_PARCEL_NUMBER - ALLEGRO_DELIVERY service has incorrect allegro parcel number
    ALLEGRO_DELIVERY_SERVICE_REQUIRED_ALLEGRO_PARCEL_NUMBER - ALLEGRO_DELIVERY service required allegro parcel number
    ...

ParcelGenerationStatusGPN.description:
Allowed values:
- OK - parcel created successfully
- INCORRECT_DATA - incorrect data
- NOT_PROCESSED - not processed

ParcelValidationErrorCodeGPN.description:
Allowed values:
- INCORRECT_WEIGHT - incorrect weight,
- PALETTE_EXCEEDED_DIMENSION_80X120X170 - Parcel exceeded dimension 80x120x170 with PALETTE service
- PALETTE_EXCEEDED_DIMENSION_80X120X180 - Parcel exceeded dimension 80x120x180 with PALETTE service
- PALETTE_EXCEEDED_DIMENSION_80X120X220 - Parcel exceeded dimension 80x120x220 with PALETTE service
- SIZE_X_OUT_OF_RANGE - size X is out of range
- SIZE_Y_OUT_OF_RANGE - size Y is out of range
- SIZE_Z_OUT_OF_RANGE - size Z is out of range
- SIZE_SUM_OUT_OF_RANGE - sum of sizes is out of range
- PARCEL_EXCEEDED_DIMENSION_38X41X64 - Parcel exceeded dimension 38x41x64

reference.description: A technical unique parcel reference (e.g. a database guid)

weight.description: The maximum weight is 31.5 kg, the minimum is 0.01 kg

sizeX.description: Dimension X of the package expressed in centimeters

sizeY.description: Dimension Y of the package expressed in centimeters

sizeZ.description: Dimension Z of the package expressed in centimeters

countryCode.description: Two character country code in ISO ALPHA-2 format

reference.description: A technical unique package reference (e.g. a database guid)

beginTime.description: Session start in ISO-8601 format in UTC zone.

endTime.description: Session end in ISO-8601 format in UTC zone.

traceId.description: Request tracking ID. By providing it, you improve the analysis of problems related to the request.

MultiPackagesGenerationStatus.description:
Allowed values:
- OK - successful package creation
- UNKNOWN_ERROR - unknown error
- INCORRECT_DATA - incorrect data
- DISABLED_API - disabled API
- ERROR_NO_FID_PERMISSION - missing permissions for FID
- DUPLICATED_PACKAGE_REFERENCE - duplicated package reference. Use unique package reference value.
- DUPLICATED_PARCEL_REFERENCE - duplicated parcel reference. Use unique parcel reference value.
- NOT_PROCESSED - not processed

PinGenerationPolicy.description:
Method of generating drop off pin. Possible values:
- STOP_ON_FIRST_ERROR - generating drop off pin for parcels is interrupted in the case of the first encountered error. Drop off pins generated up to the first error will be returned.
- IGNORE_ERRORS - no drop off pin generation interruption in case of validation error

validityPeriod.description: Validity period of pin in days. Default is set by DPD and is currently 14 days

PinSessionType.description:
Allowed values:
- DOMESTIC - Session for domestic packages
- INTERNATIONAL - Session for international packages

traceId.description: Request tracking ID. By providing it, you improve the analysis of problems related to the request.

GenerateDropOffPinStatus.description:
Allowed values:
- OK - label successfully printed.
- NOT_FOUND - not found.
- NOT_PROCESSED - not processed.
- UNKNOWN_ERROR - unknown error.
- DISABLED_API - API is disabled.
- ERROR_NO_FID_PERMISSION - missing permissions for FID.
- INCORRECT_DATA - incorrect data.
- DISALLOWED_FID - fid is disallowed.

PinGenerationStatus.description:
Allowed values:
- OK - Successfully printed
- NOT_FOUND - Packages and parcels not found
- NOT_PROCESSED - Not processed
- INCORRECT_PKGS_FOR_SESSION_TYPE - Incorrect packages for session type
- PARCEL_LIMIT_EXCEEDED - Parcel limit exceeded
- ACCESS_DENIED_FOR_FID - Access denied for FID
- UNKNOWN_ERROR - Unknown error
- ALREADY_ADVICED - Waybill already adviced
- ADVICE_ERROR - Advice error

reference.description: Reference. Identifier passed from client. Must be unique between requests.
A technical unique parcel reference (e.g. a database guid)

weight.description: In Poland, the maximum weight is 700.00 kg, the minimum is 0.01 kg. Abroad, the maximum weight is 315.00 kg, the minimum is 0.01 kg. For shipments with a pallet service, the minimum weight is 315 kg. Accuracy to two decimal places is accepted.

sizeX.description: Dimension X of the package expressed in centimeters

sizeY.description: Dimension Y of the package expressed in centimeters

sizeZ.description: Dimension Z of the package expressed in centimeters

content.description: Parcel content. The content field is required for international shipments. For domestic shipments it is optional.

reference.description: Reference ID provided by the customer

traceId.description: Request tracking ID. By providing it, you improve the analysis of problems related to the request.

AppendParcelsToPackageStatus.description:
Allowed values:
- OK - parcel added to package
- INCORRECT_DATA - incorrect request
- PACKAGE_NOT_FOUND - cannot find package
- UNKNOWN_ERROR - unknown error
- DISABLED_API - disabled API
- APPENDING_PARCELS_TO_RETURN_PACKAGE_NOT_ALLOWED - appending parcels to return package not allowed
- APPENDING_PARCELS_TO_SHIPMENT_PACKAGE_NOT_ALLOWED - appending parcels to shipment package not allowed
- PROTOCOL_GENERATED - protocol already generated

OrderType.description:
Order type. Allowed values:
- DOMESTIC - Domestic order
- INTERNATIONAL_EXPRESS - International order, classic services on roads
- INTERNATIONAL_AIR - International order. Express service by planes

pickupDate.description: Pickup date. Date cannot be in the past. ISO date yyyy-MM-dd

orderNumber.description: Order number in format AD1 + 11 digits

checkSum.description: Checksum. Currently value is numeric. But in future checksum will be strengthened to much more unique value, i.e. UUID

traceId.description: Request tracking ID. By providing it, you improve the analysis of problems related to the request.

PackagesPickupCallStatus.description:
Allowed values:
- OK - correct order change
- UNKNOWN_ERROR - unknown error
- DISABLED_API - disabled API
- DISALLOWED_FID - disallowed fid
- VALIDATION_ERROR - validation error
- NOT_FOUND - not found
- SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE - service unavailable

PickupErrorDetail.description:
Allowed values:
- INCORRECT_VALUE - incorrect value
- NOT_FOUND - not found
- INCORRECT_PICKUP_TIME - incorrect pickup time
- INCORRECT_CHECKSUM - incorrect checksum
- SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE - service unavailable
- VALIDATION - validation
- ORDER_NUMBER_ERROR - order number error
- ORDER_CLOSED_STATUS - order closed status

orderNumber.description: Order number returned during order creation

checkSum.description: Order checksum returned during order creation. In future it can be more unique value like UUID

pickupDate.description: Pickup date. Date cannot be in the past. ISO date yyyy-MM-dd

UpdateMode.description:
Update mode. Allowed values:
- DONT_CREATE_NEW_IF_CLOSED - If the updated order is already closed, no new one will be created
- CREATE_NEW_IF_CLOSED - If the updated order is already closed, a new one will be created

traceId.description: Request tracking ID. By providing it, you improve the analysis of problems related to the request.
Request tracking ID. By providing it, you improve the analysis of problems related to the request.

PostalCodeStatus.description:
Allowed values:
- OK - OK. Found postal code
- COUNTRY_CODE_NOT_FOUND - Country code not found
- POSTAL_CODE_NOT_FOUND - Postal code not found
- WRONG_POSTAL_CODE_PATTERN - Incorrect postal code pattern
- UNKNOWN_ERROR - Unknown error
- DISABLED_API - Disabled API

traceId.description: Request tracking ID. By providing it, you improve the analysis of problems related to the request.

GetCourierOrderAvailabilityStatus.description:
Allowed values:
- OK - OK. Found courier availability range
- RANGE_NOT_FOUND - Not found courier availability range
- POSTAL_CODE_NOT_FOUND - Postal code not found
- WRONG_POSTAL_PATTERN - Incorrect postal code pattern
- COUNTRY_CODE_NOT_FOUND - Country code not found
- UNKNOWN_ERROR - Unknown error
- DISABLED_API - Disabled API
